Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: The road is steep and narrow at this point. A guard rail is on the outside.
Room.LongDescription: A mountain pasture is on the south side of the road, and the rugged snow slopes rise to the east. The mountain road curves around the pasture to the southwest. Far out over the valley, near a great cloud bank, you see a copper dragon with a rider on its back.
